company_description: Revolut is a financial technology company that offers banking services, including currency exchange, money transfers, and cryptocurrency trading, through its mobile app.
founders: Max Kölb, Nikolay Storonsky, Vlad Yatsenko
seed_investors: Seedcamp, Balderton Capital, AMK Investment Office, Giano Capital, Index Ventures, Point Nine, Venrex, Loric Ventures
embedding_text: Revolut is a financial technology company that offers banking services, including currency exchange, money transfers, and cryptocurrency trading, through its mobile app.
